headline.main: LIBYAN OFFENSIVE VIEWED AS CRUCIAL; Observers Discern Links With Battle of Mediterranean and Future of Africa

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Nov. 25 -- Capital importance is attached by competent neutral observers here to the operations in Cyrenaica. They do not hold with those who view the operations as a diversion or as a concession to Premier Joseph Stalin's appeal for "a second front."
abstract: Berne neutral observers link Libyan flght to Mediterranean control and future of Africa

keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
